lead_paragraph: While bombings have hit Beirut and elsewhere during the Syrian war, such assaults have been rare in the area of Monday’s attack.

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and HWAIDA SAAD

headline.print_headline: Elaborate Suicide Attack Hits a Christian Village in Lebanon
headline.main: Elaborate Suicide Attack Hits Christian Village in Lebanon

snippet: While bombings have hit Beirut and elsewhere during the Syrian war, such assaults have been rare in the area of Monday’s attack.
abstract: Suicide bombers, in two waves of attacks, hit Christian village of Al Qaa, Lebanon, near border with Syria, leaving at least five people dead and dozen of others wounded.
